scripts.start: yarn run preset:customer --project app-eforms-notice-editor --customer default --environmentType development && yarn run postcss --project app-eforms-notice-editor --customer default && yarn run ng serve --project app-eforms-notice-editor
scripts.start-prod: yarn run preset:customer --project app-eforms-notice-editor --customer default --environmentType development && yarn run postcss --project app-eforms-notice-editor --customer default && yarn run ng serve --project app-eforms-notice-editor --configuration production
scripts.build: yarn run clean && yarn run preset:customer --project app-eforms-notice-editor --customer deploy --environmentType production && yarn run postcss --project app-eforms-notice-editor --customer deploy && yarn run ng build --configuration production --project app-eforms-notice-editor --base-href /m-eforms/
